title: (17200) Palafrugell - 6 Carrer de Vicens Vives
description: Non-drinking water tap hidden behind the laurels of the Zona Zero station. Very good flow.

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 45 Carrer del Cementiri
description: Day and night parking next to the cemetery

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 74 Paratge Brugueres
description: Parking next to a large supermarket and a huge bazaar store. It has no services, next to the road. Squares horizontally

title: (17124) Palafrugell - 78 Carrer de la Fanga
description: Almost level parking, asphalt with night lighting, city outskirts, bike lane. near shopping center, lowcost gasoline. without services. fine for one night.

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 10P Avinguda d'Espanya
description: Wide parking with shade and asphalted, near the center of Palafrugell, with shops. Right in front there is a huge esplanade without asphalt and without shade.

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 6 Avinguda de la Energía
description: Esclat Oil gas station with the possibility of filling drinking water. Gratuitous.

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 19 Avinguda de Josep Vergés i Mata
title_short: (17200) Palafrugell - 19 Avinguda de Josep Vergés i Mata
description: Free parking enabled by the town hall for cars and motorhomes. Very quiet, it is an esplanade (cultivated field prepared for parking). At 50 meters there is a Lidl and a Veritas, 10 'from Calella de Palafrugell. Please, let's take care of the environment and don't throw away any waste.

address.street: 19 Avinguda de Josep Vergés i Mata

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 10P Avinguda d'Espanya
description: Flat ground parking. Very quiet There is a small churreria, to buy churros and batons for breakfast.

title: (17213) Begur - GIP-6531
description: To rest a little, at the entrance of the small town of Esclanya.

title: (17213) - 11B Carrer dels Salincs
description: Low flow water, air, fuel pump.

title: (17253) Mont-ras - 6A Carrer Mestral
description: Drinking water and parking spaces

title: (17200) Palafrugell - 6 Paratge Farena
description: Place in the middle of nature under the fir trees, you have to take a small path to access it.

name: Camping La Siesta
title: (17210) Camping La Siesta
description: Magnificent campsite, family run. Unique location in a pine forest near the town of Calella de Palafrugell.

name: Kim’s Camping Caravaning
title: (17211) Kim’s Camping Caravaning
description:
270/5000
Kim's Camping on Llafranc beach, offers camping pitches from 70 m2 to 100 m2 with 220V and 6-10A electrical connection in the middle of a large pine forest and surrounded by nature. Pool, splash pad, bar, restaurant, laundry, animation , accommodations from 2 to 8 people.

name: Camping Relax-Nat
title: (17253) Camping Relax-Nat
description: Naturist camping (nudism is the usual way, although only obligatory in swimming pools) correct pitches, enough shade. Very good atmosphere. Multiple possibilities as a base. Also in the campsite, swimming pool, jacuzzi, tennis, paddle tennis, ballot, Basket, miniature golf and football.

title: (17212) Tamariu - 40 Carrer de l'Equador
description: Ample parking. Only valid for parking during the day. At the end of a dead end street. In low season it is closed.

name: Càmping Tamariu
title: (17212) Càmping Tamariu
description: Very well maintained campsite, located 200 m from the beach, most pitches are shaded. Large swimming pool, very clean toilets.

title: (17211) Llafranc - 23 Carrer de Virgili
description: Large free and shaded car park.

title: (17214) Regencós - Carrer Josep Pla
description: It is a vacant lot with a parking sign. nothing is prohibited. beautiful mountain views.

name: Camping Calella de Palafrugell
title: (17210) Camping Calella de Palafrugell
description: Near the center and the beach. New facilities, spotless bathrooms. There is a swimming pool and supermarket. Under the works of some tall pines.

title: (17214) Regencós - 1 Camí A
description: It is a very quiet little picnic area with trees, we have been eating and no one has called our attention. You could sleep although there is only room for two or three parking spaces.

title: (17211) Llafranc - 16 Camí de la Font d'en Xecu
title_short: (17211) Llafranc - 16 Camí de la Font d'en Xecu
description: Parking in battery where there is no sign forbidden to stay overnight. We spent one night with no problems. Of course, it is a miracle to find a place. It fits a 6 meter camper without problem

address.street: 16 Camí de la Font d'en Xecu

title: (17214) Regencós - GI-653
description: Large parking area near centre of small village, nearby restaurant. Place for 30 vehicles.

title: (17211) Llafranc - 14 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
description: Residential area, with plenty of parking, 5' walk from the beach. Very quiet place where we slept wonderfully.

name: Camping Moby Dick
title: (17210) Camping Moby Dick
description:
Camping Moby Dick, a campsite with 2 motorhome areas overlooking the grass and the sea, water filling included and chemical toilet nearby. Excellent location: 3 minutes walk from the beach of Calella de Palafrugell (Costa Brava), 5 minutes from the city center. Wifi and salt water pool included. Special rate Park4night 2022 for 2 nights for 2 adults with a minimum of 2 nights: From €20 in low season to €37 in high season per night. Need reservation, insert PARK4NIGHT in the Comments field.

Calella de Palafrugell is a coastal village considered Spain's favorite by readers of Traveler 2017 and one of the most beautiful in the Mediterranean. The campsite is divided into plots with terraces, integrated into nature, many with sea views and a very special character.

title: (17211) Llafranc - 23 Carrer Filipines
description: We spent one night here and very quiet. It is surrounded by nature and the trees provide good shade. There were no more vans but it is next to a residential area

title: (17212) Tamariu - 18 Carrer d'Aigua Blava
description: Quiet car park with around 20 fairly flat spaces set back from a few buildings. perfect during the day to access the beach and the great hikes around. Water, toilet and shower on the beach

title: (17212) Palafrugell - 16 Paratge Ros Lluny
description: Apartadito on the shoulder of the road, we stopped to eat, two vans would fit.

title: (17200) Mont-ras - Avinguda de la Costa Brava
title_short: (17200) Mont-ras - Avinguda de la Costa Brava
description: By passing an urbanization you arrive by a road to a very flat area, surrounded by trees perfectly ordered, there is no prohibition signs or private area.

title: (17256) Pals - C-31
description: Not a service area only a carwash here

name: Camping Mas Patoxas
title: (17256) Camping Mas Patoxas
description: Very large campsite with pool, supermarket and restaurant. Many flat and shady pitches. Located on a slope next to a busy country road. In the low season the supermarket, restaurants etc. are closed.

name: Càmping Begur
title: (17255) Càmping Begur
description: Begur, GIP-6531. Camping in the middle of the pine trees pleasant welcome

title: (17211) Llafranc - 15 Carrer del Nero
description: Really lucky find in this particular town it is very hard to park please be aware that we have a 6 m Mercedes sprinter that just fits in where we were parked in residential street 30m away there is a car park but unfortunately they don’t allow motorhomes in there I checked with the locals and they said that I was completely legally parked which was okay for me but if you’re coming here thinking you might find a space then you might be disappointed as at the weekend there are a lot of people that come to stay here and the place is packed it is only 100 m to the beach beautiful views, I thoroughly recommend it but as I said it is really only suitable for 1 small camper. There is a variety of local restaurants and shops fantastic walks round the harbour and the beaches were the cleanest clearest waters I have ever seen. I will finish by stressing again that you need to have only a small camper to be able to get down the street.

title: (17212) Llafranc - 8 Vial Camino
description: Way to a small bay, way there is very narrow and difficult to access. But very close to the beach :) and hardly any people. The marked spot is a "stop bay" 100m further you can stand under trees at the edge of the field.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 30 Camí Jardí Botànic
description: Online parking in a quiet area of a residential neighborhood. 20 minutes walk from the coves of Calella. Good place to park and get to know Calella de Palafrugell.

title: (17255) Begur - 20 Carrer Manuel de Pedrolo
description: A small forest next to a supermarket. There are no signs of forbidden to park, I spent 2 days with my motorhome without problem. There are more autocs and campers

title: (17211) Llafranc - 12-14 Passeig de Carles Vilà
description: Parking along the street (very sloping) to go up to the lighthouse. It climbs dry, be careful, we turn to the street then to leave, so not suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
description: Free parking without prohibition sign, it is in oblique battery and they have at least 6 meters. Ideal for the Ronda road. From Calella de Palafruguell to Llafranc. Perfect for AC and Camper. Best place found given the restrictions for AC and that in Llafranc it was impossible to park.

address.street: 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig

title: (17211) Llafranch - Carrer de l'Uruguai
description:
Nice place in the Far de San Sebastià parking lot if you get the hole that has views of the towns of Llafranc and Calella. You do not have to pay, allowed to stay overnight.
Capacity for 10/15 cars. At lunch and dinner hours it is quite busy due to the restaurants that are in the surroundings

title: (17123) Torrent -
description: Old asphalt road (the extension of the road here at park4night, just across the c-66). This place is nicer because of beautiful view of Pals. Quiet place but with incessant hum of the road in the background. Terrain is not flat but very spacious. Definitely need blocks. Accessible from the roundabout between the GI-652 and the C-66, drive next to the vineyard. Please bring your garbage (including toilet paper!) with you.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
description: Free parking with few spaces but very close to the beach. On Google it says free parking.

address.street: 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig

title: (17211) Llafranc - 2 Carrer del Paraguai
description: Roadside, space for one car. It has trees that provide some shade. It has a somewhat large pothole at the entrance. Quiet despite roadside and stunning views. Cc and Van impossible due to potholes

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 8 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 8 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
description: Esplanada de tierra, 2km from the center of town. We have spent a quiet night, without any service.

title: (17212) Palafrugell - 13 Carrer de l'Avi Xaixu
description: Street urbanization with parking without restrictions overnight / camping. Next to the entrance of the Cala d'Aigua Xelida. In summer season it is full.

title: (17212) Palafrugell - 1 Carrer de la Foradada
description: Small plot of land in an urbanization near two coves / beautiful beaches (cala d'aigua Xelida and Cala Marquesa). Camping and overnight prohibited.

title: (17255) Begur - 2B Carrer d'Ausiàs March
description: Perfect level open space under trees. close to the road but sheltered. shade in the morning. possible for 3/4 van. we leave it clean please

title: (17210) Calella de Palafrugell - 2 Passatge Cap Roig
title_short: (17210) Calella de Palafrugell - 2 Passatge Cap Roig
description: Small car park overlooking the sea on the side of the road that leads to the Jardins de Roig Natural Park. From 8 p.m. the gardens are closed, so no more traffic on the road. There is room for 2 cars/vans. Located next to an electrical shack, the electricians/people from the town hall who take care of it came by in the morning and didn't tell us anything. A bit of traffic in the morning (hikers, joggers etc) but very quiet overall.

title: (17255) Begur - 1 Carrer Platja d'Aiguablava
description: Parking without level spaces with many shadows. At 21.00 they close with a chain. Overnight stays are allowed but camping is not (sign from the Begur town hall that makes this explicit)

title: (17255) Begur - 4V Carrer de Ramon Llull
description: Free parking, very close to the town just 200m, but very quiet, totally flat floor, great capacity for at least 50 vehicles.

title: (17123) Torrent - 1 Lloc Rte els Revolts
description: Old asphalt road decommissioned, close to the road ideal for picnicking not trying to sleep but it would have done. quiet. it's been two times since nobody ever comes

title: (17255) Begur - 2 Camí Camp de Futbol
description: Large grassy car park under the trees behind the football field. Possibility of sleeping without problem. We asked the technical services. Close to the town center of Begur Camping prohibited!

title: (17253) Calella de Palafrugell - Unnamed Road
description: Asphalted and ground parking next to the Gardens of Cap Roig. Parking surrounded by nature, quiet, inside the park or protected area. there is space for motor homes.

title: (17255) Begur - 4 Passeig de sa Miranda
description: Convenient parking to visit begur on foot Pentu Dish in tarred bottom

title: (17253) Vall-llobrega - 11 Carrer Raval de Mar
description: At the entrance of a mini village. Since it is extremely difficult to find something for free here in the bypass, we test it. Bulli for four :)

title: (17255) Girona - 6V Carrer Magnolia
description: Impressive view over Begur. Spaces for 2 vans. No services. We spent the night there without any problems. Quite a bit of wind so you sleep very well in summer.

title: (17255) Girona - 16V Carretera Fornells
description: Nice place to stop to enjoy the views of the Mediterranean and the coast. I don't know if you can stay overnight. Nothing indicates otherwise but as the parking is small and our AC of 7m, so as not to disturb us we went to another place

name: Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
title: (17230) Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
title_short: (17230) Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
description: Comfortable campsite 500 meters from Castel beach on the edge of the natural park.

title: (17255) Begur - 2 Carrer Font de Baix
description: Free public parking, without slope, a park right in front

title: (17253) Vall-llobrega - 17 Calle Raval de Mar
description: Parking of sand with park for children and adults gym public washrooms with restaurants and bakery very quiet place departure for walking and bike routes.

title: (17255) Begur - 6 Carrer de Carles de Viladomeny
title_short: (17255) Begur - 6 Carrer de Carles de Viladomeny
description: Free parking on land, for motorhomes - in complete peace. Without services. 6 minutes by road from the city center.

title: (17256) Pals - 67 Carrer Enginyer Algarra
description: Parking next to the road. Very large and flat. No shade or services. 10 minutes from the center of Pals. Only available in summer! In front there is another smaller car park (all year round).

title: (17256) Pals - 59 Carrer Samaria
description: Unmarked parking. At least there are no prohibitions of any kind. Near the center of town, a few meters. Ideal to see the town. Noisy to sleep

title: (17256) Pals - 62 Carrer Enginyer Algarra
description: Free parking at the entrance of Pals. No services. Ample ground parking for large AC. It has no shadow. You cannot camp. We did not spend the night. Noisy if you park on the side of the road. It is advisable to park here if you go with AC, the car parks in the center of town are narrow and full of cars.

title: (17256) Pals - 34 Diseminado Barri Carmany
description: In the middle of a pine forest, near a small road with very little traffic, 2 places for the night. Very calm. They pass hiking trails and vtt. We have cleaned the area of cans, papers. To improve our image and coexistence with the locals, all campers should help clean the environment where we spend the night (toilet paper and all rubbish).

title: (17255) Begur - 15 Carrer Josep Pages I Ribot
title_short: (17255) Begur - 15 Carrer Josep Pages I Ribot
description:
Gravel path lined with wild fennel in a neighborhood under construction on the heights of Begur. An esplanade with stunning views is blocked by concrete pillars but accessible on foot.
Parking for 1 to 2 vehicles.

title: (17255) Begur - 37 Carrer Carles d'Homs
description: Place on the outskirts of Begur, in contact with nature, urbanized and quiet area to take a break

title: (17255) Begur - 1 Carrer Lluna
description: Big free parking in the middle of the town.. many campers and van when i was here.. is easy and u can go in town without move your car

title: (17230) Palamós - Carretera de Castell
description: Plotting land about 500mts from the beach of Castell, quiet and with some shade. Without services. In the beach, which is about 300mts, the height is limited and it is very crowded. Here much better even if you have to walk a little.

title: (17230) Palamós - C-31
description: Gas station water refill point. Correct the flow.

title: (17256) Pals - 3 Carrer Enric Fort Prolongacio
description: Small quiet car park with shady camping tables nearby. The price is correct and with a little luck we can find a place in the shade. The car park is near the historic center on foot.

title: (17255) Begur - 2 Carrer Mercuri
description: Large car park for parking several free camper very rare in this region next to begure very beautiful village

title: (17256) Pals - 28 Carrer Enric Fort Prolongacio
description: Water fountain in the corner of the skatepark.

title: (17256) Pals - 5 Camí Fondo
description: Large free parking at the foot of the historic city of Pals in clay, with public toilets nearby and games for children.Vans only

title: (17230) Palamós - C-31
description: SUPERMARKET DAYPARKING  It is the parking of the supermarket during the day. Along the path. Next to Repsol. It is not the best car park since it has no services and is on the side of the road, but if you don't know where to park, it is a good option.

title: (17256) Pals - 15 Carrer la Vinya
description: Esplanade on a street cut off to be able to park AC not very large. Historic center 2 min.

title: (17256) Pals - 14 Passeig Aniceta Figueres i Soler
title_short: (17256) Pals - 14 Passeig Aniceta Figueres i Soler
description: Small car park of the tourist office, at the entrance of the town, with quite long spaces. It does not put any sign regarding overnight stays, nor size restrictions.

title: (17255) Begur - 12 Passeig de Carmen Amaya
description: Parking isolated and quiet with only "temporary parking" information. Access free and free September 15, 2016. We have parked there for a meal but we did not spend the night but no contraindication, beautiful panorama and as far as the eye can see in good weather, no equipment and no opinion on the safety of the premises.

title: (17230) Palamós - Carrer Sant Esteve
description: Very large beach parking lot. Walk to the cala of Saint Alguer, and to the prehistoric village then to the Callela de Pallafruguel. Barrier at 2 m during our 2nd pass, but we can park by the roadside.Night prohibited on the coast

title: (17256) Pals - 25A Diseminado la Barri Font
description: Small parking next to the cemetery, rather for small vehicles. Dead end at the end of which two motorhomes can park without interference.

title: (17255) Begur - 55 Carrer Rec de Sa Tuna
title_short: (17255) Begur - 55 Carrer Rec de Sa Tuna
description: Quiet place, on top of the mountain with views of Illes Medes and Cap de Creus. Small place to turn. Not recommended motorhomes.

name: Camping Kings
title: (17230) Camping Kings
description: Camping Kings located very close to Platja de la Fosca and Cala S'Alguer.

title: (17256) Pals - 1B Carrer St Fructuos-masos de Pals
title_short: (17256) Pals - 1B Carrer St Fructuos-masos de Pals
description: Parking at the edge of the main road with poor access and with a small park for the youngest Camper Routers to play, it has a water source.

title: (17230) Palamós - 2 Carretera Sant Esteve
description: Small roundabout with about 7 parking spaces. We did not sleep there. Next door begins a route to reach Cap Roig, passing through coves, beaches, castles, an Iberian village... Although it is quite close to residential buildings, it seems quiet.

title: (17255) Sa Riera - 19 Carrer Santiago Rusinyol
description: Parking without payment near the Beach.

title: (17255) Begur - 64 Carrer del Camí del Semafor
title_short: (17255) Begur - 64 Carrer del Camí del Semafor
description: Small promontory overlooking the sea, a few meters from the semaphore. Access is possible only for vans, the branches of the trees prevent the transition to large trucks.

title: (17230) Palamós - 144 Carrer Sant Esteve
description: Parking on the side of the street, flat ground. Very close by a path leading to the beaches.

title: (17255) Begur - 17 Carrer Rec de l'Aigua
description: Parking in a residential area with views of the sea, we were walking around the coves of begur and we found it to be one of the best options because the rest of the car parks do not have views. On the other side of the cove there is a dirt road, which you can see at the end from the parking lot, where you can reach the sea, although there is no sand, it is all rocks. EYE! Do not try to go down the dirt road with the van, there is a piece of soft sand and we can hardly go back up. If you want to get off it is best to leave the van at the beginning of the road.

title: (17256) Pantaleu -
description: To enjoy the tranquility without entering a parking lot full of cars. Suitable for medium vans but something just right for GV and AC. Good place on the limits of the area "La Muntanya Seca" and very close to a multitude of stone villages typical of the area such as Palau-Sator, Peratallada, Sant Feliu de Boada, Torrent... You can go to all of them by bike from here without having to move the van.

title: (17255) Begur - 47B Carretera Sa Tuna
description: Slightly sloping ground next to the road, we slept without problem. A steep path descends to the cove of Sa Tuna.

title: (17255) Begur - 14B Carrer Rec de l'Aigua
description:
Access by a steep dirt road.
perfectly flat parking area.

title: (17255) Sa Riera - 65 Carretera de la Plaja del Raco
title_short: (17255) Sa Riera - 65 Carretera de la Plaja del Raco
description: Daytime parking payment from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. Free night. Height limitation 2.2 m

address.street: 65 Carretera de la Plaja del Raco

title: (17255) Begur - 11 Carrer Port d'es Pi
description: Beautiful quiet spot at the end of a road that becomes a path in the woods. View on the bay and a 5 minute walk from the beach below. It’s close to the garden of a house but the people in it saw us and didn’t mind we were staying here for the night.

title: (17255) Sa Tuna - 1B Avinguda Garbi
description: Ground parking, sleeping is allowed. There is a fee (From 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.), you have to look for the man who charges to give you the ticket, it usually happens or is in the lowest parking lot that is only for cars. This parking is 5 minutes from a beautiful beach. It has no shade or any services. During the day it is usually full, very quiet to sleep, no noise.

title: (17230) Palamós - 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa
title_short: (17230) Palamós - 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa
description: Place to go to the beach. There is no service but on the beach there are beach bars, pedal boats and showers. It is a wide, one-way street alongside a pine forest. Parking is prohibited at night.

address.street: 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa

title: (17230) Palamós - 26 Passeig de la Fosca
description: Beach shower/ foot shower. not so great to fill drinking water as there is no explicit tap.

title: (17255) Sa Tuna - 2 Avinguda Garbi
description: Parking at Ta Tuna beach in Begur. Outside the summer season, no parking prohibition sign and direct access to a magnificent bay with a pebble beach. Small restaurant open in the bay.

title: (17255) Begur - 51 Carretera Sa Tuna
description: Small parking at 5 minutes from the beach of Sa Tuna and S'Eixugudor. Ideal to avoid paying parking

name: Camping Internacional de Palamós
title: (17230) Camping Internacional de Palamós
description: International Camping Palamós. Good stay, very quiet in low season and with all services. Very new facilities. There are large pitches and other smaller pitches (no problem with camper and table) These pitches have an overnight rate from 7am to 10am for €17.90, €5.30 extra if you want electricity. Very close to the beach (5 minutes walk) and the center of Palamós (15 minutes walk). Swimming pool open from June to September. In the main season, at least 4 nights for €198/2 people including electricity

address.street: s/n Camí de Cap de Planes

title: (17255) Begur - 8 Carrer Aiguafreda
description: Paid parking, friendly guard. With this payment you have access to another car park 100 m above. The nearest beach is sloping, that of the flat top. Beware of rush hours in the summer, park the motorhomes forward if you want to avoid complicated maneuvers

title: (17256) Pals - 5 Diseminado Barri Rodors-masos Pals
description: Small clearing under the pines in peace and shade. The path is sandy but easy to access. Once on the sandy path, pass the two houses on the left and take the path on the left just after the second house. A few dozen meters away in the forest, on the right, you can park flat among the pines. Further to the left, there is another high ledge for a second car.

title: (17230) Palamós - 3 Carrer d' Àngel Guimerà
description: Large dirt parking lot, we spent the quiet night there. a supermarket 5 mins walk away, and the town center just behind. Ideal for one night.

title: (17255) Begur - 23 Passeig Pic dels Ocells
description: Between Sa Tuna and Aiguafreda, on the edge of a small one-stop street (many passages during the day, few at night). Sea view (3 minutes walk). Easy access in June at the end of the day but in summer a lot of cars.

name: Autocaravaning Palamós SL
title: (17230) Autocaravaning Palamós SL
description: AUTOCARAVANING PALAMÓS is a service area for motorhomes. Within walking distance in 15 minutes: supermarket, city center and La Fosca beach. Connection from there to hiking trail GR92, numerous bays and beaches (Cala S'alguer, Castell and Cala Estreta, among others). There is a bus and bike path that connects to the "Petit Train" route at the entrance to the area. The prices are all inclusive, water change, electricity, WiFi (in the reception area) and toilet. Washing machine (10 kg) (with soap and fabric softener included in the price) and dryer. The pitches are terraced, compact and also suitable for heavy mobile homes. For reservations please contact by email

title: (17230) Palamós - 25D Passatge Roqueta
description: Camper park-ean egon eta gero, hurrengo egunean kanpoko parkinean aparkatu genuen SOILIK EGUNERANL izan ere badura kartelan nun loa debekatzen den, baina ondartzara joateko edota cami de ronda wgiteko leku aproposa

name: Camping Interpals
title: (17256) Camping Interpals
description: Very good campsite, everything nearby. Very pleasant stay.

name: Camping Sandaya Cypsela Resort
title: (17256) Camping Sandaya Cypsela Resort
description: Top 5 star campsite. We have known him for several years, he has evolved a lot. 2 swimming pools, one with children's area. Small grocery store and bakery. Mini golf bowling bar... shuttle bus to the beach. Very good restaurant

title: (17255) Begur - 24 Carrer Cap Sa Sal
description: Parking in a very quiet pine forest during the day and with access to the Aiguafreda cove through the cami de ronda in 5 minutes. We have not spent the night here but because of the garbage that can be seen, it is possible that it is a nighttime meeting place for the local youth. It is located on the access road to a hotel and several luxury homes, so even the neighbors do not agree that we spend the night here.

title: (17256) Pals - 4 GIV-6502
description: Nice place to sleep one night, quick access to the beach of you have a bicicle

title: (17256) Pals - 6 Carrer del Conill
description: Asphalt parking, large and with few cars. Suitable for motorhomes and large cars, easy access.

title: (17230) Palamós - 19 Carrer de sa Tamardia
description: Perfect parking area next to a pine forest. Perfect for spending the day next to the beach.

title: (17230) Palamós - 14 Ronda de l'Est
description: Quiet parking, flat ground. No services. a lot of room. To spend the night without problem. Only for mini campers of no more than 2.1 m.

title: (17256) Pals - 219 Plaça Pals Mar
description: Free parking area on public land (pine forest), without a sign that prohibits overnight stays. It has good shade and fairly level terrain.

title: (17255) Begur - 2 Passatge Racó
description: Free parking and quiet out of season. Access to the beach, some places in the shade.

title: (17255) Begur - 51 GIV-6534
description: A little busy roadside parking with a very quiet small lot. Sea view, sound of waves and cicadas ... No signs but I spent two afternoons and two nights without worries. for alone or as a couple

title: (17256) Pals - 1 Edifici Ap Paraiso Pals
description: Parking right on the beach, between apartment buildings. Would say, just before or after season. In April, everything was still empty NDB still no parking machines set up. Together 3 such parking lots. Attention, limit to 3.5 tons.

name: EmpordArea
title: (17230) EmpordArea
description: We are a service area for motorhomes. Open 365 days a year. We are in a fishing village on the Costa Brava. We are 1km from the beaches and coves and Les Gavarres Natural Park, 300m from Esclat supermarket and gas station, 5 minutes from Palamós town, 700m from the bars and/or restaurants, 1300m from the Tourist Office and 500m from the bus stop. The price of the place depends on the season: -  In addition we have hot showers and a washing machine (8kg) and  water changes if not staying in the area. We also sell REPSOL butane and propane bottles, 2 liter Aqua kem blue and ambiti men's and women's bottles. To book you can go to the website, write to us by email / whatsapp or call us easily.

address.street: Camí del Pla del Llop s/n - C/ Puig gorgoll s/n

title: (17256) Els Masos de Pals -
description: Small forest with room for 2-3 motorhome, it is next to a little traveled road, very quiet. We stop to eat and stay for a little while.

title: (17256) Pals - 46 Carrer Gregal
description: Picnic area  with about 15 tables, there are some public bathrooms (there is no schedule) everything is shaded area. There is no pet ban. Next door there is a car park where apparently you can't spend the night, there is free parking nearby and a blue zone.

title: (17230) Palamós - 1D Carrer de la Font
description: Dirt parking 10 minutes walk from the city center, spacious and quiet place to park but without trees that provide shade.

title: (17256) Pals - 1 Edifici Ap les Medes
description: Parking, no service. Direct access to the beach and the dunes. Protected natural area route. It is a blue zone, but does not operate out of season. There is a sign, only for campers under 3.5t

name: Camping Palamós
title: (17230) Camping Palamós
description:
Palamós, 12 Carretera de la Fosca. Camping Palamós, 
near beautiful beach.


Camping Palamós
Fosca 12 road,

Located above Cala Margarida and Cala dels Pots, with direct access to the sea. Pool, yakuzzi, services included.
Special prices for CamperVan.

title: (17230) Sant Joan de Palamós - 10 Carrer Narcís Pagès i Prats
title_short: (17230) Sant Joan de Palamós - 10 Carrer Narcís Pagès i Prats
description: Parking in front of the Palamós municipal football stadium. Right in front there is a park to walk the dog or relax on a bench. Close to shops.

name: Camping Neptuno
title: (17256) Camping Neptuno
description: Beautiful camping, with services of emptying and replenishing water, showers, toilets and electricity among others.

title: (17113) Peretallada - GI-651
description: Parking near the village. Free in low season. No services. Very calm. Beautiful medieval village. Peretallada

title: (17256) Pals - 4 Diseminado Barri Bernagar-masos Pals
description: Nice little space in the forest far enough from the already quiet main road. Much nicer than the bridge spot further. Failed to take photos as left before sunrise. Probably room for 3 vans but lovely for 1.

title: (17230) Palamós - 15-17 Passeig del Mar
description: Drinking water from tap on the boulevard. Park up in the Car park as mentioned in another post, but go further down to the children's play park then it's 10m from there.

title: (17230) Palamós - Plaça Murada
description: Prohibition sign height greater than 2 m. WC open day and night. Excellent restaurants (Arrels) and taverns (El Galeo and Txoko) and shops but it's over for us.

title: (17256) Palau-Sator - Carrer Mota
description: Ideal place to spend the night, or spend the day, free, without services, medeival town with charm ..

title: (17251) Calonge - 2 Carrer Voramar
description: Blue Zone next to the beach with views of Palamós and Sant Antoni de Calonge from your vehicle. Little crowded out of season.

title: (17252) Calonge - 4 Carrer Marítim
description: Public parking free of land, this signposted access but it is a bit difficult, overnight stay with motorhomes, but in low season there is no problem, next to the beach and the promenade, with bike lane, very quiet, no services minimum.

title: (17113) Peratallada - 3 Carrer la Bisbal-perat
description: Great find! Lovely space with drinking water tap and free and clean public toilets. Lovely friendly attendant who happily told us we could stay overnight. According to him this was the better of the 2 car parks for sleeping in?

title: (17251) Calonge - 31 Carrer de l'Empordà
description: Camping in a vacant lot near the beach. 5 minutes away.

title: (17256) Fontanilles - Unnamed Road
description: The parking lot of the Mooma cider house. If you dine / eat they let you sleep in the parking lot in the middle of the apple trees. A spectacular place. Dogs allowed in restaurant.

title: (17251) Calonge - 53 Avinguda Catalunya
description: Public land parking with supermarkets nearby you can spend the night. Quite busy during the day.

title: (17257) Pals - Unnamed Road
description: Small area of trees at the crossroads. Large area for one or two motorhomes. Ideal for an evening after a drink at the disco Les Teules.

name: Camping Playa Brava
title: (17256) Camping Playa Brava
description: Tourist campsite at a high price. The beach is at the end of the campsite and the shop is at the entrance to the campsite.

name: Eurocamping
title: (17252) Eurocamping
description: Very pretty 4* campsite, spacious pitch, top staff. 2 very large swimming pool, beach 300 meters away, reservation recommended in season. out of season acsi card from may to end of september .

title: (17256) Pals - 336 Urbanitzacio Arenals Mar Sector 3
description: Parking day and night EXCEPT FROM JUNE 1 TO SEPTEMBER 15, which is authorized from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - 1 C-66
description: Free land parking. Shadow. Without services Gas station 50 meters with all services. Bar / restaurant in front of the parking lot.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
title_short: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
description: Parking day and night. We have spent a very quiet night, without the noise of the road from the area on the other side. The town is very pretty and very well preserved. From here you can make an excursion to the peratallada castle, by a very easy track, 8km round trip.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Crta. C-66, km.8 (BP Vulpellac)
description: BP service station with terminal to fill and empty the water and with 4 parking spaces to spend the night with terminal to connect to the light. There is a supermarket with a bakery and all kinds of items, a washing area for motorhomes and a children's play area. Free WIFI. Terminals with tokens, with a consumption in fuel or in the supermarket, a free token

title: (17251) Calonge - 21 Avinguda de Sant Jordi
description: Free parking at the entrance of the town.

name: Càmping Pla de la Torre
title: (17252) Càmping Pla de la Torre
description:
Small, quiet and familiar campsite, there are: Modern toilets with permanent hot water. 
Grocery with essential products (bread, milk, butter, water, wine, ice cream, etc.), bar / terrace. It is located 800 m from the beach Torre Valentina (sand). 
Around 500 m you can find: 
6 supermarkets, 8 restaurants, a petrol station and 2 garages. 
All our clients can enjoy the Olympic swimming pool at Camping Internacional Palamós, located 5 km away.

name: Càmping Costa Brava
title: (17251) Càmping Costa Brava
description: Campsite on the Costa Brava. Family campsite and very quiet. There are few motorhome pitches because there are a lot of trees and it is difficult to maneuver. But if you have one, that's fine. It's not very big but it has the essentials: bar, swimming pool, bathrooms, showers, black drain... And tranquility. There is a small store with the essentials, but in front of the campsite there is a supermarket. Among the cheapest we have seen on the Costa Brava. In the city center, very close to everything. 10min walk from the beach.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 40 Carrer Coll-Verd
description: Parking in a dead end. Next to private pools which can be a bit noisy at night. 10 min walk to the beach with shower and cafe restaurant. Slept well.

title: (17100) Sant Pol -
description: Quiet place to rest without noise surrounded by nature.

title: (17256) Torroella de Montgrí - 55 Carrer Cardina
description: Parking for the night and enjoy the beach.

title: (17251) Calonge - 39 Avinguda Pau Casals
description: Open parking without clearance! In the middle of a quiet urbanization 5 minutes from the beach. From 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m. sign of prohibition

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 76 Carrer Martinet
description: Free parking in a residential area. Also suitable for campers. Direct access to the beach. No services. There is a beach shower on the beach. Another RV seemed to stay overnight but we only came for the beach visit.

name: El Delfin Verde
title: (17257) El Delfin Verde
description: El Mas Pinell, 53 Càmping Delfín Verde. Camping El Delfín Verde - Costa Brava

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
description:
Excellent modern laundry, machines of all sizes, plus special stand alone pet bed washer and dryer.
Large car park alongside so perfect access.

title: (17118) - Unnamed Road
description: Flat location 10 minutes from the Ganga pass. Reserved for SUV and 4x4. Risk of being closed in summer due to fire risks

title: (17251) Calonge - 14 Carrer Josep Lluís Sert
description: Quiet street to park right next to the beach and some bar to eat

title: (17252) Castell Madeleine - 25 Vial Camino
description:
Quiet place to park to go to the beach not too far. There was no parking space for miles.
here it was fine for the day but slightly sloping.

title: (17114) Ullastret - GI-644
description: Municipal cemetery, with beautiful views, quiet, near the road.

title: (17257) Fontanilles - 3 Carrer Església Romànica de Sant Martí (s.XII)
title_short: (17257) Fontanilles - 3 Carrer Església Romànica de Sant Martí (s.XII)
description: Parking next to the Romanesque church with some shade or other and great to visit the town, eat something and follow the path. The town is small but it has charm. The restaurants in the area look very good and don't seem expensive. There is a water tap attached to the wall.

address.street: 3 Carrer Església Romànica de Sant Martí (s.XII)

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
description: Fairly flat ground parking, 5 'walk to town, good for parking and spending the night.

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
description: Very nice place to visit La Bisbal and / or buy the famous ceramics

name: Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title_short: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
description: A good alternative to the motorhome area for a daytime visit in case that the 4 places at the area are full or if the motorhome area is blocked off for the Friday morning market. There was lots of space to park to visit the market and town next to the football stadium.

name: Camping Treumal
title: (17251) Camping Treumal
description: Camping Treumal. Super Staircase with lots of vegetation and sea views! With access to the sea (coarse sand beach) small supermarket and restaurant! Pitches are awarded on first come first serve! Very friendly and good cleanliness of the amenities!

name: Camping Internacional de Calonge
title: (17251) Camping Internacional de Calonge
description: Calonge, 9 Avinguda Andorra. Camping Calonge in platja d'aro

title: (17114) -
description: Parking for day and night. Tall and calm. There are no services or anything. I spent two very quiet nights there.

title: (17114) Ullastret - 10 Carrer Rectoria
description:
Very large parking lot with shade.
no service but spacious and safe.
3 km from the paying car parks of Parataillada. Good for a quiet night, there is the road but not very busy. No prohibition sign. Very good alternative for paid parking in tourist villages.

name: Camping Cala Gogo
title: (17251) Camping Cala Gogo
description: Camping Cala Gogo next to Platja d'Aro less than 10min by bike. Very nice campsite and very large, in stairs, not easy to level the CC on the pitches. Several swimming pools, direct access to the very beautiful beach. Electricity and water on the plots. Big black point, it is impossible to drain the DC from the area provided for this purpose is not functional!!

title: (17114) Ullastret - GIV-6442
description: Amazing place to spend the night, the day, super quiet. with small fountain but difficult to put any hose. We loved a 10

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
description: Parking supermarket very quietly with gas station without services and in the center of the bisbal de l'empordà

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí de la Gola de Sobre Ter
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí de la Gola de Sobre Ter
description: Nice parking. Surrounded by river, fields and sea. Very quiet in direct beach location. Accessible via dirt road. Clean, very quiet.

address.street: Camí de la Gola de Sobre Ter

title: (17251) Calonge - GIV-6612
description: Plane, unpaved and at least at night and weekdays quiet place. On the driveway is a short, slightly steeper, bumpy passage - in wet and for large motorhomes less suitable. Located on a small stream. A bit close to the road, but barely visible from there.

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 22 Carrer Ginjoler
description: White parking area in a residential area, next to a park and part with shade

title: (17257) Llabià - 1 Carrer Major
description: Fountain and garbage sorting corner a little further to the right, impeccable, thanks to the municipality.

title: (17116) Cruilles - 2 Cami St Poncio
description: Cruilles, very quiet place like the same village looks like ghost a super quiet night, super recommended

title: (17257) Gualta - C-31
description: Picnic area with parking and content. Sense serveis però to the coast of the road to Torroella.

title: (17249) Castell-Platja d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Steep track, not suitable for large caravans, you remove a fence and you can enter. Very quiet night.

title: (17257) Llabià -
description: A great place to stay between thyme and flowers with a view of a castle.

title: (17257) Gualta -
description: 2 camper pitches with electricity and water at the pitch & putt golf course. You can park here for free when you use the golf course spent in restaurant. Best to book in advance through reception. Very friendly staff. Beautiful par 3 golf course!

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 42 Urbanitzacio la Platera
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 42 Urbanitzacio la Platera
description: Parking area on a street with flat land area, 50 meters from the sea. Quiet urbanization. without services. Views of the natural park.

name: Autocaravaning La Granja
title: (17257) Autocaravaning La Granja
description:
Camper area located on a family farm. Natural Park of Montgrí and Les Illes Medes. Hiking routes 
 ( Montgrí castle ) and greenways by bicycle ( The river Ter ).  On Monday, weekly market.

title: (17257) - 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6
title_short: (17257)  - 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6
description: Discreet, quiet, paved and central parking, we spent the night very quiet without any noise, it is just behind the carrefour behind some buildings and the truth is the best we found in the area.

address.street: 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6

title: (17133) Serra de Daró - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in the countryside. Access via a good dirt road, very wide and feasible for larger vehicles. Place very quiet, a few cars, cyclists or pedestrians, but all with a smile on their faces. (Place was very littered!! First cleaned up! Please take garbage with you!) Stayed 3 days without any problems

title: (17249) Platja d'Aro - 88 Avinguda del Cavall Bernat
title_short: (17249) Platja d'Aro - 88 Avinguda del Cavall Bernat
description: Laundry services, with very modern machines.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 41 Passeig de Vicenç Bou
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 41 Passeig de Vicenç Bou
description: Washing machine tumble dryer owner very nice no reference on Google map open 24/24 opening button on the front door washing machine 6th laundry included dryer 3rd

name: Camping El Molino
title: (17258) Camping El Molino
description: Torroella de Montgrí, 365 Avinguda de les Illes Medes. Very close to the beach. El Molino campsite is located south of the village of L'Estartit opposite the Medas islands by the sea. Hot water (0.50 Eur / 5 million).

title: (17117) Girona - 10 Vial Camino
description: Space to park next to the Monastery of Sant Miquel de Cruïlles. Good views, quiet and shady.

title: (17249) Platja d'Aro - 69 Avinguda de Fanals
description: Parking Esglesia de Fanals

title: (17258) Els Griells - 22 Carrer Tulipa
description: Place that say nothing about the parking of motorhomes. Little shade but very close to the beach (50mts) We did not see any services. But if a little tourist train passes by. On the beach there are dutxas. The place is an esplanade of land. Respect the place. And enjoy! !!!!! There is height limitation 2.2 Galibo

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 28 Carrer Riu Ter
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 28 Carrer Riu Ter
description: Torroella de Montgri. Large parking without service, quiet and convenient to visit the city and the castle. Very quiet super for a nuot

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 8 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
title_short: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 8 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: Automatic laundry / 4 machines.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 57 Carrer del Garbí
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 57 Carrer del Garbí
description: Ample municipal parking, where vehicles can park up to 3.5 t. There are public toilets, just below the parking.

title: (17240) Sant Miquel d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place in the middle of nature, it is a parking lot for hiking and mountain biking. To get there, the road is paved and winding. We went up from romanya de la Selva. Some tight passages when crossing another vehicle but it was largely doable with our 7m cc. A 3 min walk you have the Puig d'arques weather station with a 360 degree view. Magnificent sunset. No services. Space for picnicking. Ideal with a dog. Weak 4g reception. Slightly sloping ground. Passage the day of mountain biker, hiker and some motorcycles.

name: Càmping Les Medes
title: (17258) Càmping Les Medes
description: Camping Les Medes Cat.1, Paratge Tree Camp, 17258 L'Estartit, first class campsite. Amazing bathroom facilities. With indoor pool, but the outdoor pool is closed in October. At least 1 km from the beach. Open all year Plots too small, spaces too narrow between the trees.

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 27 Carrer Ginesta
description: Sandy day parking lot. Quiet, close to the city center and the beach. On the Carrefour car park. no services

title: (17121) Corçà - 48 Carrer Major
description: Quiet parking, no noise at night. Charming little town. Routes on foot and by bike.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 39 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 39 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
description: Small spot under the olive trees, we spent a quiet night in a converted car. (no police passing or particular discomfort) there is a large municipal car park a little further in the village with a drinking water point and public toilets (disabled access). there's a gymnasium and a stadium nearby, when there's a party you can hear it but it's not a problem.

title: (17258) Els Griells - 7 Passeig Marítim
description: It is a gravel parking lot in a residential area, very large and half empty around 8:30 a.m. on a Tuesday, suitable for our 6.36m long and 2.60m high Citroën pössl. Perfect for kayak tours (5 min to the organizer)! Unfortunately, due to the height, you are not allowed to stand on the beach: /

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 11 Carrer Juli Garreta
description: Close to everything. Suitable for long motorhomes as well. Before noon (weekend) there is a lot of space to park. Section under trees have big parking spots.  Drinking water available. Coordinates: 41°48'56.0"N 3°03'46.6"E Also near to laundry, cafe with free WiFi, playground and Pp's Park (the best for kids). About 10 min walk to the beach. A lot of shops, restaurants...

title: (17133) Serra de Daró - Carrer de la Font
title_short: (17133) Serra de Daró - Carrer de la Font
description:
Drinking water and recycling point.

Update: the water does not taste very nice after a couple of hours, like a chlorine taste so I do not recommend it for drinking.

title: (17121) Corçà - 9 Avinguda de Santa Cristina
description: Issue of Santa Cristina. Less than 1 km from Monell. It only has a bench and a couple of stones as a table. And a trash can. Ideal to stop to eat and even spend the night because the ground is quite smooth.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 49 Ronda Pau Casals
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 49 Ronda Pau Casals
description: Quiet parking lot at the foot of a mountain, on the outskirts. At night without lights. We parked here in the morning to hike to the castle. Great view! You can definitely spend the night here too. No designated parking space for mobile homes, but also no prohibition sign…

name: Camping Ter
title: (17258) Camping Ter
description: Camping Ter attracted attention after our 2 days stay with a well thought-out infrastructure and nice hosts. The furniture is a bit old but completely intact. We felt good. Flooring lawn and shady trees :-)

address.street: 142 Camí Vell de Torroella a l'Estartit

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 61B Lloc les Escoles dels Estanys
title_short: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 61B Lloc les Escoles dels Estanys
description: Parking good during my first visit from Tuesday 06-14-2022 to 06-16-2022 morning, very close and very pleasant beach. Today crowded parking lot and more people with old caravans occupy the pitches as they go! So much less pleasant. Night disturbed by the cries of seagulls.
